references.paper_title: BOP: Benchmark for 6D object pose estimation
references.reason: This paper introduces the Benchmark for 6D Object Pose estimation, establishing a common ground for evaluating and comparing different 6D pose estimation methods.

references.paper_title: MegaPose: 6D Pose Estimation of Novel Objects via Render & Compare
references.reason: This paper introduces MegaPose, which is used by many methods in the challenge and is designed for 6D pose estimation of novel objects by rendering and comparing.

references.paper_title: CNOS: A Strong Baseline for CAD-based Novel Object Segmentation
references.reason: This paper presents a strong baseline method for CAD-based novel object segmentation (CNOS), often used for providing initial detections.

references.paper_title: GenFlow: Generalizable Recurrent Flow for 6D Pose Refinement of Novel Objects
references.reason: This paper introduces GenFlow, a generalizable recurrent flow method for 6D pose refinement, serving as a baseline for many methods in the challenge.

references.paper_title: 6-DoF pose estimation of household objects for robotic manipulation: An accessible dataset and benchmark
references.reason: This paper introduces the HOPE dataset, and it is used in many tracks, particularly for evaluating robotic manipulation of household objects.
